flawed_nl_solution:
She takes 0.07 minutes to answer a question because 12 / 16 = <<12/16=0.07>>0.07
It will take her 6 minutes to take the entire exam because 80 x 0.07 = <<80*0.07=6>>6
She has 54 minutes left when she is done because 60 - 6 = <<60-6=54>>54
#### 54

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 0.75, not 0.075. It appears the decimal point was misplaced.
